name: C_Epita
description:
This script will help you,  with the EPITA norme.
 * Headers are automaticaly generated on writing FILE
 * cindent is config
 * (norme checker) not yet implemented
install_details: copy the file in your plugin dir (ex : ~/.vim/plugin)

versions.release_notes:
Fix a bug in the generted HEADERS, who are more thn 80 columns.
On saving:
* Generate Headers
* Generate #ifndef for the .h files
* Delete tailing white spaces
* warn you if your function contains more than 25 lines
* add a function <Esc>count_line_func who count the number of lines inside a C function
